alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 28 at 2:27PM EDT until September 29 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Coastal Volusia County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Some flooding of low-lying lots, parks and roadways may occur near the shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The next couple high tide cycles where the potential for minor coastal flooding will be highest will be around 8 PM this evening and again around 8 AM Friday.
info.instruction: Onshore winds and above normal tides will combine to generate flooding of low areas along the shore. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
